ObjectClass.Name: Haruspex A.C.V. (Achron)
ObjectClass.Description:
HARUSPEX Achronal Command Vehicle: Mobile temporal transceiver equipped operations-command center Houses an Achron commander (i.e. you)
Repairs itself and allies at long range Can revive frozen units
Engages Temporal Shield when endangered

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 2.25, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 28, Aggro Radius: 32

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 80, R 26, SR 2, Sta S\Air: 60, R 18, Sta S

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Recover Status
Objective.Details: \Clear negative status effects:\ Freeze, Comm Jam, Nanites

Objective.Name: Fix Unit
Objective.Details: \Repair target's shields\+4 hp/s, x3 if energized; R 30\ \Use on any unit or structure

Objective.Name: Assert Temporal Supremacy
Objective.Details: \Force defeat on remaining enemies\ \This action is ineffective in the future

ObjectClass.Name: Damaged Haruspex A.C.V.
ObjectClass.Description:
HARUSPEX Achronal Command Vehicle:
Achronal transceiver command vehicle
This unit has engaged a Temporal Shield due to excessive local threat level (50 s duration)
